title: Relapse Prevention Plan
description: Create a comprehensive plan to identify warning signs and prevent relapse

fields.label: Physical Warning Signs
fields.help: Changes in sleep, appetite, energy, health, hygiene, etc.

fields.label: Emotional Warning Signs
fields.help: Mood swings, irritability, anxiety, depression, anger, etc.

fields.label: Behavioral Warning Signs
fields.help: Isolating, skipping meetings, dishonesty, risky situations, etc.

fields.label: Thinking/Mental Warning Signs
fields.help: Glamorizing use, minimizing consequences, overconfidence, etc.

fields.label: My High-Risk Situations
fields.help: People, places, events, or situations that put me at risk

fields.label: My Coping Strategies
fields.help: Healthy ways I can respond when triggered or stressed

fields.label: My Support Network
fields.help: Names and phone numbers of people I can call for support

fields.label: Emergency Contacts
fields.help: Crisis hotlines, treatment centers, hospitals, sponsor, etc.

fields.label: My Daily Recovery Practices
fields.help: Meeting attendance, prayer/meditation, exercise, journaling, etc.

fields.label: Self-Care Activities
fields.help: Activities that support my physical, emotional, and spiritual health

fields.label: Why I Want to Stay Clean
fields.help: Personal motivations, goals, values, people I care about

fields.label: My Action Plan for Urges/Cravings
fields.help: Step-by-step actions to take when experiencing urges
